change.changenote: Section 2 (1) (part) and (2) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 118/2018, effective June 15, 2018.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: For the purposes of section 806 of the Act, in addition to the certification required under subsection (1) (b) (i) [amount requisitioned is included in financial plan] of that section, the designated regional district officer must certify the following in relation to each service for which an amount is requisitioned under that section:
A certification under section 806 of the Act must be made in a form established by the Surveyor of Taxes.
